remarks: The ` N ` -th derivative of ` F ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem30.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
etransclem30.a $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
etransclem30.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem30.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem30.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem30.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem30.h $e |- H = ( j e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( x e. X |-> ( ( x - j ) ^ if ( j = 0 , ( P - 1 ) , P ) ) ) ) $.
etransclem30.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> { c e. ( ( 0 ... n ) ^m ( 0 ... M ) ) | sum_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( c ` j ) = n } ) $.
etransclem30 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ c e. ( C ` N ) ( ( ( ! ` N ) / prod_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( ! ` ( c ` j ) ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( ( ( S Dn ( H ` j ) ) ` ( c ` j ) ) ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d C c $.
$d H c j n x $.
$d M c j n x $.
$d N c j n x $.
$d P j x $.
$d S c j n x $.
$d X j n x $.
$d j n ph x $.
